title: 위기 소통과 대중 안심 (Crisis Communication and Public Reassurance)
intent: 위기 상황에서 대중을 안심시키고 명확한 정보를 제공하며 신뢰를 유지하는 공식적 담화 능력을 기른다.
lexset: I want to assure the public that..., We are taking immediate action to..., The situation is under control..., Transparency is our priority..., We will continue to monitor..., Emergency protocols have been activated..., Public safety remains our top concern..., We are working closely with authorities..., Regular updates will be provided..., Your safety is paramount...
traps: 과도한 안심 vs 현실적 우려 균형

seeds.kr: 국민 여러분께 상황이 통제되고 있음을 확신시켜드립니다.
seeds.en: I want to assure the public that the situation is under control.

seeds.kr: 우리는 이 문제를 해결하기 위해 즉각적인 조치를 취하고 있습니다.
seeds.en: We are taking immediate action to address this issue.
We will continue to monitor the situation closely.
Emergency protocols have been activated immediately.
Public safety remains our top concern.

seeds.kr: 우리는 관련 기관과 긴밀히 협력하고 있습니다.
seeds.en: We are working closely with all relevant authorities.
Regular updates will be provided to keep everyone informed.
Your safety is paramount to us.

seeds.kr: 우리는 이 어려운 시기를 함께 극복할 것입니다.
seeds.en: We will overcome this challenging time together.
